project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that presents multiple-choice questions to the user, tracks their score, and displays the results at the end of the game.

task.name: Implement the main application that runs the quiz game.
Create a list of multiple-choice questions and answers.
Implement functionality to display each question and gather user input.
Implement score tracking based on user responses.
Implement final score display after all questions have been answered.
Write tests to ensure each part of the quiz functionality works correctly.
Execute tests on the complete quiz game to verify accurate functionality and score tracking.
